General.Name: Saudi RE Cooperative Reinsurance
General.Description: Saudi Reinsurance Company provides various reinsurance solutions in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, rest of the Middle East, Africa, Asia, and internationally. It offers engineering, fire, marine, motor, general accident, protection, life, health, specialty, and other products. The company was formerly known as Saudi Re for Cooperative Reinsurance. Saudi Reinsurance Company was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Northern Ring Road, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 13313
